document_data.name: Hatharal Korianthil
document_data.mainbody: '''Hatharal Korianthil''' was an [[elf|elven]] [[war wizard]] and leader of [[House Korianthil]].
document_data.History: He had extensive experience as both a war [[wizard]] and a mercenary prior to the [[Retreat]].
